item.description:
COME JOIN OUR TEAM - WE ARE LOOKING FOR VOLUNTEERS!

The 11th Annual BLIFF 2012 will be held October 25th- 28th at Harvard University and Northeastern University

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Volunteer Information Session

Location:

Northeastern University / Latino Cultural Center

104 Forsyth Street, Boston, MA 02115

[Right on the Green and Orange T Lines - Ruggles and Northeastern University Stops]

 

When:

Tuesday, Oct. 2nd

6:00 - 7:00 PM

and

7:00 - 8:00 PM

[choose to attend one info session]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Volunteering opportunities in the following areas:

 

Festival Staff (Tickets, Info Tables, etc...)

Marketing & Public Relations

Graphic Design - Web Design

Media Coordination / Communications

Fundraising (Sponsorships & Grants)

Event Coordination, Project Management & Hospitality

 

This is a great opportunity to practice your Spanish, meet industry professionals and be part of a highly effective volunteer team.  Our meetings are in English, but there are plenty of chances to practice Spanish if desired.  Come have fun, learn about the film industry, make connections and have fun during the process!

 

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are unable to attend this meetup info. session and would like to volunteer for BLIFF 2012, email Jennifer at jluong@bliff.org for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: Right on the Green and Orange T Lines (Ruggles & Northeastern University Stops)

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Volunteer for the Boston Latino International Film Festival!
